content: cobblestones this is a very simple pattern using texture to create a thermal hat that can be made as a beanie or by adding more repeats a slouchier version materials worsted weight yarn about 190 yards i used handspun yarn for each example size 7 16 circular needles size 7 double pointed needles tapestry needle abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit two stitches together as if they were one p2tog purl two stitches together as if they were one k3tog knit three stitches together as if they were one cast on 100 stitches or a multiple of 4 place a stitch marker to mark the beginning of the round ribbing *k2 p2* repeated around for about 2 inches cobblestone pattern rounds 1-3 knit around round 4 *k2 p2* repeat around rounds 5-7 knit around round 8 *p2 k2* repeat around repeat this 8 round pattern until hat measures 6 from cast on edge for beanie or 8 from cast on edge for the slouchy version ending with round 3 continue in pattern for crown decreases as well starting decreases round 1 *k2 p2tog* repeat around rounds 2 3 & 4 knit around round 5 *p2tog k* repeat around rounds 6 7 & 8 knit around round 9 *k1 p2tog* repeat around until last two stitches k1 p1 rounds 10 knit around round 11 k2tog around round 12 knit around round 13 k2tog until last 3 stitches k3tog round 14 knit around you should have 8 stitches left cut yarn and thread through remaining 8 stitches weave in ends and enjoy
